text: Devonte Perkins, known professionally as K-Trap, is a British rapper and songwriter from South London. ==Discography== ===Mixtapes=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of mixtapes, with selected details and peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2"| Details ! scope="col" colspan="1"| Peak chart positions |- ! scope="col" style="width:3em;font- size:85%;"| UK |- ! scope="row"| The Last Whip | * Released: 25 June 2017 * Label: Self- released * Format: Digital download, streaming | — |- ! scope="row"| The Re-Up | * Released: 12 July 2018 * Label: Just Jam * Format: Digital download, streaming | 37 |- ! scope="row"| No Magic | * Released: 11 July 2019 * Label: Black Butter * Format: Digital download, streaming | 33 |- | colspan="4" style="font-size:90%"| "—" denotes a recording that did not chart or was not released in that territory. |} ==References== Category:People from Lambeth Category:Rappers from London Category:Living people Category:English male rappers
title: K-Trap
